appSlogan: Compress a day's learning into just one hour.

viewMode.listTooltip: Display all problems in list view
viewMode.pathTooltip: Display by learning path dependency, from easy to hard

animationTooltip.hasAnimation: This problem has an interactive animation. Click to visit the demo site.
animationTooltip.noAnimation: This problem has no interactive animation yet. Can't wait? Click to create an issue to speed it up!
animationTooltip.clickToView: Click to view full animation demo

tooltips.openLeetcode: Click to open LeetCode problem page

resetProgress.tooltip: Clear all learning progress and start over
resetProgress.title: Confirm Reset?
resetProgress.message: This will clear all your learning progress, including completed problem marks. This action cannot be undone.
